import React from 'react'; import StarIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Star'; import StarHalfIcon from '@material-ui/icons/StarHalf'; import StarBorderIcon from '@material-ui/icons/StarBorder'; import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import ExpandMoreIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ExpandMore'; const ProductsPage = () => { window.onload = () => { const scrollTop = document.querySelectorAll('img'); for (var i = 0; i < scrollTop.length; i++) { scrollTop[i].onclick = () => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); } } } const categoryToggle = () => { const catMain = document.getElementsByClassName('category_main'); if(catMain[0].style.display === 'none') { catMain[0].style.display = 'flex'; }else { catMain[0].style.display = 'none'; } } return ( <>
